# nxos_banner_prelogin (Resource)

This resource can manage the Prelogin Banner configuration.

- API Documentation: [aaaPreLoginBanner](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-2-2/docs/Security%20and%20Policing/aaa:PreLoginBanner/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "nxos_banner_prelogin" "example" {
  motd_banner = "Welcome to the network."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `motd_banner` (String) Banner message.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The distinguished name of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import nxos_banner_prelogin.example "sys/userext/preloginbanner"
```
